verses.verse: וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze fell הַגּוֹרָ֜ל <S%H1486><s%> hag-go-Ral And the lot לִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei of the children יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef of Joseph מִיַּרְדֵּ֣ן <S%H3383><s%> mi-yar-Den from Jordan יְרִיח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho, by Jericho לְמֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> le-Mei unto the water יְרִיח֖וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho of Jericho מִזְרָ֑חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah; on the east הַמִּדְבָּ֗ר <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Bar, to the wilderness עֹלֶ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Leh that goeth up מִירִיח֛וֹ <S%H3405><s%> mi-ri-Cho from Jericho בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har throughout mount בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵֽל׃ <S%H1008><s%> 'El. Bethel

וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza And goeth out מִבֵּֽית־ mib-beit- אֵ֖ל <S%H1008><s%> 'el from Bethel ל֑וּזָה <S%H3870><s%> Lu-zah; to Luz וְעָבַ֛ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var and passeth along אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul unto the borders הָאַרְכִּ֖י <S%H757><s%> ha-'ar-Ki of Archi עֲטָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H5852><s%> a-ta-Rot. to Ataroth

וְיָֽרַד־ <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-rad- And goeth down יָ֜מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah westward אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul to the coast הַיַּפְלֵטִ֗י <S%H3311><s%> hai-yaf-le-Ti, of Japhleti עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad far גְּב֧וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul unto the coast בֵּית־ beit- חוֹרֹ֛ן <S%H1032><s%> cho-Ron of Bethhoron תַּחְתּ֖וֹן <S%H8481><s%> tach-Ton the nether וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- far גָּ֑זֶר <S%H1507><s%> Ga-zer; and to Gezer וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become; תֹצְאֹתֹו to-tze-'o-tov כתֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> to-tze-'o-Tav plenty קיָֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah. thereof are at the sea

וַיִּנְחֲל֥וּ <S%H5157><s%> vai-yin-cha-Lu took their inheritance בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- So the children יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef of Joseph מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh וְאֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> ve-'ef-Ra-yim. and Ephraim

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi now גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And the border בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families וַיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become גְּב֤וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul was [thus] even the border נַחֲלָתָם֙ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam of their inheritance מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah, on the east side עַטְר֣וֹת at-Rot אַדָּ֔ר <S%H5853><s%> 'ad-Dar, was Atarothaddar עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far בֵּ֥ית beit חוֹרֹ֖ן <S%H1032><s%> cho-Ron unto Bethhoron עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon. the upper

וְיָצָ֨א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza went out הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border הַיָּ֗מָּה <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam-mah, toward the sea הַֽמִּכְמְתָת֙ <S%H4366><s%> ham-mich-me-Tat to Michmethah מִצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tza-Fon, on the north side וְנָסַ֧ב <S%H5437><s%> ve-na-Sav went about הַגְּב֛וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul and the border מִזְרָ֖חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah eastward תַּאֲנַ֣ת ta-'a-Nat שִׁלֹ֑ה <S%H8387><s%> shi-Loh; unto Taanathshiloh וְעָבַ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var and passed אוֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, מִמִּזְרַ֖ח <S%H4217><s%> mi-miz-Rach by it on the east יָנֽוֹחָה׃ <S%H3239><s%> ya-No-chah. to Janohah

וְיָרַ֥ד <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-Rad And it went down מִיָּנ֖וֹחָה <S%H3239><s%> mi-ya-No-chah from Janohah עֲטָר֣וֹת <S%H5852><s%> a-ta-Rot to Ataroth וְנַעֲרָ֑תָה <S%H5292><s%> ve-na-'a-Ra-tah; and to Naarath וּפָגַע֙ <S%H6293><s%> u-fa-Ga' and came בִּֽירִיח֔וֹ <S%H3405><s%> bi-ri-Cho, to Jericho וְיָצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza and went out הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den. at Jordan

מִתַּפּ֜וּחַ <S%H8599><s%> mit-tap-Pu-ach from Tappuah יֵלֵ֨ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ye-Lech continued הַגְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul The border יָ֙מָּה֙ <S%H3220><s%> yam-mah westward נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> Na-chal unto the river קָנָ֔ה <S%H7071><s%> ka-Nah, Kanah וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu and the goings תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> to-tze-'o-Tav and the goings out הַיָּ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam-mah; thereof were at the sea זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> Zot, likewise נַחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat This [is] the inheritance מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. by their families

וְהֶעָרִ֗ים <S%H5892><s%> ve-he-'a-Rim, cities הַמִּבְדָּלוֹת֙ <S%H3995><s%> ham-miv-da-lOt And the separate לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei for the children אֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch [were] among נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-Lat the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh; of Manasseh כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- all הֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim all the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> ve-chatz-rei-Hen. with their villages

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not הוֹרִ֔ישׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> ho-Ri-shu, And they drave not out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> hai-yo-Shev that dwelt בְּגָ֑זֶר <S%H1507><s%> be-Ga-zer; in Gezer וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev dwell הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֜י <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni but the Canaanites בְּקֶ֤רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev among אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim the Ephraimites עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, to this וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi became לְמַס־ <S%H4522><s%> le-mas- under tribute עֹבֵֽד׃ <S%H5647><s%> 'o-Ved. and serve פ Peh
